MS.S: Microsoft Azure PowerShell - Cmdlets to manage resources in Azure. This module is compatible with WindowsPowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A_For more information about the Az module, please visit the following: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/azure/

4.3.0 - June 2020_x000D__x000A_Az.Accounts_x000D__x000A_* Supported discovering environment setting by default and adding environment via 'Add-AzEnvironment'_x000D__x000A_* Update preloaded assemblies [#12024], [#11976]_x000D__x000A_* Updated Azure.Core assembly_x000D__x000A_* Fixed an issue that may cause 'Connect-AzAccount' to fail in multi-threaded execution [#11201]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Aks_x000D__x000A_* Replaced usage of old [AccessProfile API](https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/aks/managedclusters/getaccessprofile) with calls to [ListClusterAdmin](https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/aks/managedclusters/listclusteradmincredentials) and [ListClusterUser](https://docs.microsoft.com/rest/api/aks/managedclusters/listclusterusercredentials) APIs_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Batch_x000D__x000A_* Updated Az.Batch to use 'Microsoft.Azure.Management.Batch' SDK version to 11.0.0_x000D__x000A_* Added the ability to set the BatchAccount Identity in the 'New-AzBatchAccount' cmdlet_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.CognitiveServices_x000D__x000A_* Supported displaying account capabilities._x000D__x000A_* Supported modifying PublicNetworkAccess._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Compute_x000D__x000A_* Added SimulateEviction parameter to Set-AzVM and Set-AzVmssVM cmdlets._x000D__x000A_* Added 'Premium_LRS' to the argument completer of StorageAccountType parameter for New-AzGalleryImageVersion cmdlet._x000D__x000A_* Added Substatuses to VMCustomScriptExtension [#11297]_x000D__x000A_* Added 'Delete' to the argument completer of EvictionPolicy parameter for New-AzVM and New-AzVMConfig cmdlets._x000D__x000A_* Fixed name of new VM Extension for SAP_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.DataFactory_x000D__x000A_* Updated ADF .Net SDK version to 4.9.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.EventHub_x000D__x000A_* Added Managed Identity parameters to 'New-AzEventHubNamespace' and 'Set-AzEventHubNamespace' cmdlets_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Functions_x000D__x000A_* Added support to create PowerShell 7.0 and Java 11 function apps_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.HDInsight_x000D__x000A_* Supported listing hosts and restart specific hosts of the HDInsight cluster._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.HealthcareApis_x000D__x000A_* Updated the SDK version to 1.1.0_x000D__x000A_* Added support for Export settings and Managed Identity_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Monitor_x000D__x000A_* Fixed input object parameter for 'Set-AzActivityLogAlert'_x000D__x000A_* Fixed 'InputObject' parameter for 'Set-AzActionGroup' [#10868]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Network_x000D__x000A_* Added support for AddressPrefixType parameter to 'Remove-AzExpressRouteCircuitConnectionConfig'_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlets for Azure FirewallPolicy_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzFirewallPolicyDnsSetting'_x000D__x000A_ - Support for Destination FQDN in Network Rules for Firewall Policy_x000D__x000A_* Added support for backend address pool operations_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzLoadBalancerBackendAddressConfig'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzLoadBalancerBackendAddressPool'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzLoadBalancerBackendAddressPool'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzLoadBalancerBackendAddressPool'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzLoadBalancerBackendAddressPool'_x000D__x000A_* Added name validation for 'New-AzIpGroup'_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlets for Azure FirewallPolicy_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzFirewallPolicyThreatIntelWhitelist'_x000D__x000A_* Updated below commands for feature: Custom dns servers set/remove on VirtualWan P2SVpnGateway._x000D__x000A_ - Updated New-AzP2sVpnGateway: Added optional parameter '-CustomDnsServer' for customers to specify their dns servers to set on P2SVpnGateway, which can be used by Point to site clients._x000D__x000A_ - Updated Update-AzP2sVpnGateway: Added optional parameter '-CustomDnsServer' for customers to specify their dns servers to set on P2SVpnGateway, which can be used by Point to site clients._x000D__x000A_* Updated 'Update-AzVpnGateway'_x000D__x000A_ - Added optional parameter '-BgpPeeringAddress' for customers to specify their custom bgps to set on VpnGateway._x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet to support resetting the routing state of a VirtualHub resource:_x000D__x000A_ - 'Reset-AzHubRouter'_x000D__x000A_* Updated below things based on recent swagger change for Firewall Policy_x000D__x000A_ - Changes names for RuleGroup, RuleCollectionGroup and RuleType_x000D__x000A_ - Added support for Firewall Policy NAT Rule Collections to support multiple NAT Rule Collection_x000D__x000A_* [Breaking Change] Added mandatory parameter 'SourceIpGroup' for 'New-AzFirewallPolicyApplicationRule' and 'New-AzFirewallPolicyNetworkRule'._x000D__x000A_* [Breaking Change] Fixed 'New-AzFirewallPolicyApplicationRule', parameter 'SourceAddress' to be mandatory._x000D__x000A_* [Breaking Change] Fixed 'New-AzFirewallPolicyApplicationRule', parameter 'SourceAddress' to be mandatory._x000D__x000A_* [Breaking Change] Removed mandatory parameters: 'TranslatedAddress', 'TranslatedPort' for 'New-AzFirewallPolicyNatRuleCollection'._x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlets to support PrivateLink On Application Gateway_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkIpConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlets for HubRouteTables child resource of VirtualHub._x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzVHubRoute'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzVHubRouteTable'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzVHubRouteTable'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Update-AzVHubRouteTable'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzVHubRouteTable'_x000D__x000A_* Updated existing cmdlets to support optional RoutingConfiguration input parameter for custom routing in VirtualWan._x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzExpressRouteConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzExpressRouteConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzVirtualHubVnetConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Update-AzVirtualHubVnetConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzVpnConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Update-AzVpnConnection'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzP2sVpnGateway'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Update-AzP2sVpnGateway'_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.OperationalInsights_x000D__x000A_* Fixed bug PSWorkspace doesn't implement IOperationalInsightsWorkspace [#12135]_x000D__x000A_* Added 'pergb2018' to valid value set of parameter 'Sku' in 'Set-AzOperationalInsightsWorkspace' _x000D__x000A_* Added alias 'FunctionParameters' for parameter 'FunctionParameter' to_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzOperationalInsightsSavedSearch'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzOperationalInsightsSavedSearch'_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.RecoveryServices_x000D__x000A_* Azure Backup added support for fetching MAB items._x000D__x000A_* Azure Site Recovery supports disk type 'StandardSSD_LRS'_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Resources_x000D__x000A_* Added 'UsageLocation', 'GivenName', 'Surname', 'AccountEnabled', 'MailNickname', 'Mail' on 'PSADUser' [#10526] [#10497]_x000D__x000A_* Fixed issue that '-Mail' doesn't work on 'Get-AzADUser' [#11981]_x000D__x000A_* Added '-ExcludeChangeType' parameter to 'Get-AzDeploymentWhatIfResult' and 'Get-AzResourceGroupDeploymentWhatIfResult'_x000D__x000A_* Added '-WhatIfExcludeChangeType' parameter to 'New-AzDeployment' and 'New-AzResourceGroupDeployment'_x000D__x000A_* Updated 'Test-Az*Deployment' cmdlets to show better error messages_x000D__x000A_* Fixed help message for '-Name' parameter of deployment create and What-If cmdlets_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Sql_x000D__x000A_* Added support for service principal for Set SQL Server Azure Active Directory Admin cmdlet_x000D__x000A_* Fixed sync issue in Data Classification cmdlets._x000D__x000A_* Supported searching user by mail on 'Set-AzSqlServerActiveDirectoryAdministrator' [#12192]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Storage_x000D__x000A_* Supported create Storage account with RequireInfrastructureEncryption_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzStorageAccount'_x000D__x000A_* Moved the logic of loading Azure.Core to Az.Accounts_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Websites_x000D__x000A_* Added safeguard to delete created webapp if restore failed in 'Restore-AzDeletedWebApp'_x000D__x000A_* Added 'SourceWebApp.Location' for 'New-AzWebApp' and 'New-AzWebAppSlot'_x000D__x000A_* Fixed bug that prevented changing Container settings in 'Set-AzWebApp' and 'Set-AzWebAppSlot'_x000D__x000A_* Fixed bug to get SiteConfig when -Name is not given for Get-AzWebApp_x000D__x000A_* Added a support to create ASP for Linux Apps_x000D__x000A_* Added exceptions for clone across resource groups

Microsoft Azure PowerShell - Cmdlets to manage resources in Azure. This module is compatible with WindowsPowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A_For more information about the Az module, please visit the following: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/azure/
